value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="250" width="460" height="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="RCea-TYpWx0lMPhDDEGV-2" value="Geek" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="140" y="450" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" />
